meanings.definition: The rear surface of the human body from the shoulders to the hips.
meanings.sent1: She landed on her backside after slipping on the ice.
meanings.sent2: He sat on the backside of the bench to rest.
meanings.sent3: The backside of the chair looked like a frowning face.
meanings.sent4: The moon's backside is always hidden from view.
meanings.sent5: The backside of the house had a beautiful garden.

meanings.definition: The part of a piece of clothing that covers the buttocks.
meanings.sent1: Her skirt was too short, revealing her backside.
meanings.sent2: The backside of his pants had a small tear.
meanings.sent3: The backside of the dress had a cute bow detail.
meanings.sent4: The backside of the jeans had a logo stitched on.
meanings.sent5: The backside of the swimsuit was a vibrant color.

meanings.definition: The reverse side or surface of an object.
meanings.sent1: He turned the photo frame to see the backside.
meanings.sent2: The backside of the painting was signed by the artist.
meanings.sent3: The backside of the book had a surprise illustration.
meanings.sent4: The backside of the coin had a different design.
meanings.sent5: The backside of the card was blank.

meanings.definition: The part of a chair or seat that supports the lower back.
meanings.sent1: The ergonomic chair had great support for the backside.
meanings.sent2: He adjusted the backside of the seat for more comfort.
meanings.sent3: The backside of the sofa had a hidden compartment.
meanings.sent4: The backside of the stool was cushioned for extra comfort.
meanings.sent5: The backside of the office chair had a mesh design for breathability.
